title: In game "Freezing"
body:
Just got an alienware 15 i5 with windows 10 a month back, it runs fun, I have cooling pads on it, great internet provider and hook it up to my LCD tv monitor with no dramas, I thought I'd outline this part before anyone tried to throw in a suggestion regarding those elements being the error.

The issue is this, 1/3 league games, on the third game, it will periodically freeze, just nothing will respond, no menus can be opened, no movement of any sort, no animation at all and not even a working cursor, I can also not alt tab out or even do anything to remotely accomplish anything.

The solution I have so far requires opening the laptop lid and closing it again to reset the display so it works again.

This has cost me way too many deaths and losses in ranked and I truly wish to have it resolved, any help will be appreciated but please, refrain from stupid advice like "have you tried turning it off and on again?" 

Anyway, thank you, if this is the wrong area of the forum or whatever, please move it to the right one, it won't let me post anywhere else so sorry if I broke a rule or something, thanks again
